title: Games Included With GTA+
headline: Games Included With GTA+
subtitle: Now includes Red Dead Redemption
content:
Red Dead Redemption is now part of the Games Included With GTA+ library.

Red Dead Redemption tells the story of former outlaw John Marston as he journeys across the sprawling expanses of the American West and Mexico to track down the last remaining members of the Van der Linde Gang.

Also includes Undead Nightmare, the story expansion that reimagines the world of Red Dead Redemption with a spooky, supernatural twist.
